name: a feast for geese
description:
you should talk to strangers. 

one day, you decide to do just that. you sit on the park bench, and begin talking to a mysterious figure. the more you talk, the more you let down your walls, the more you learn about yourself, and the stranger. 

every choice has consequences. there are four unique endings.

features:

  • over 100+ unique lines of dialogue to explore
  • four unique endings to discover
  • original art and audio
  • a bird-adjacent experience

CREDITS

Art & Animation: Max Lama & Conor Toland

Programming: Max Mitchell

Music: Conor Toland

Dialogue: Max Mitchell

Created in under 72 hours for The Completion Jam, December 2020.
